Context:
* An unofficial transcript is available through STU-View account at stuview.georgebrown.ca.
* Official transcripts can be requested through the Academic Records Request Form or by contacting the Academic Records department directly.
* Official transcripts must be addressed to the intended institution and presented in a sealed envelope with the official college stamp.
* A fee of $85.00 is required for requesting an official transcript and Nursing License forms and program information.
* Processing time for official transcript requests is 4-6 weeks.
* For Ontario post-secondary institutions, online transcript requests can be made on their websites if an application has already been submitted.
* Official transcripts for graduates of the collaborative Nursing degree program are only available through Toronto Metropolitan University (TMU).
* TMU's transcript request form can be obtained online via their transcript request portal or by contacting their Records department at 416-979-5136.
* George Brown College has adopted the MyCredsâ„¢ platform for issuing official transcripts and digitized credentials.
* Contact information for George Brown College: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca, social media hub.
* Application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours and more can be signed up for on the website.
* Important notice: Information contained in this website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
